trans-unit.source: Merge Entity
trans-unit.target: Merge Entity

trans-unit.source: Merge Entity
trans-unit.target: Merge Entity

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Merge Entity</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation updates an existing entity by updating the entity's properties.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Merge Entity</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation updates an existing entity by updating the entity's properties.

trans-unit.source: This operation does not replace the existing entity, as the <link xlink:href="96a833e2-388c-460c-bfad-11e723c67d3f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Entity</link> operation does.
trans-unit.target: This operation does not replace the existing entity, as the <link xlink:href="96a833e2-388c-460c-bfad-11e723c67d3f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Entity</link> operation does.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Merge Entity</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Merge Entity</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is recommended.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account, <parameterReference>mytable</parameterReference> with the name of your table, and <placeholder>myPartitionKey</placeholder> and <placeholder>myRowKey</placeholder> with the name of the partition key and row key identifying the entity to be updated:
trans-unit.target: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account, <parameterReference>mytable</parameterReference> with the name of your table, and <placeholder>myPartitionKey</placeholder> and <placeholder>myRowKey</placeholder> with the name of the partition key and row key identifying the entity to be updated:

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: The address of the entity to be updated may take a number of forms on the request URI.
trans-unit.target: The address of the entity to be updated may take a number of forms on the request URI.

trans-unit.source: See the <externalLink><linkText>OData Protocol</linkText><linkUri>http://www.odata.org/</linkUri></externalLink> for additional details.
trans-unit.target: See the <externalLink><linkText>OData Protocol</linkText><linkUri>http://www.odata.org/</linkUri></externalLink> for additional details.

trans-unit.source: Emulated storage Service URI
trans-unit.target: Emulated storage Service URI

trans-unit.source: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Table service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10002</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:
trans-unit.target: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Table service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10002</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: The Table service in the storage emulator differs from the Windows® Azure™ Table service in several ways.
trans-unit.target: The Table service in the storage emulator differs from the Windows® Azure™ Table service in several ways.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <legacyLink xlink:href="c60f2090-c0f4-4817-8559-e98786461dbe" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Differences Between the Storage Emulator and Azure Storage Services</legacyLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <legacyLink xlink:href="c60f2090-c0f4-4817-8559-e98786461dbe" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Differences Between the Storage Emulator and Azure Storage Services</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes required and optional request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes required and optional request headers.

trans-unit.source: Request header
trans-unit.target: Request header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>Date</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-date</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>Date</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-date</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the content type of the payload.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the content type of the payload.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are <codeInline>application/atom+xml</codeInline> and <codeInline>application/json</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: Possible values are <codeInline>application/atom+xml</codeInline> and <codeInline>application/json</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about valid content types, see <link xlink:href="9f1dce4a-d528-40ec-a5a4-fd93f9ee4c5e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Payload Format for Table Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about valid content types, see <link xlink:href="9f1dce4a-d528-40ec-a5a4-fd93f9ee4c5e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Payload Format for Table Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: The length of the request body.
trans-unit.target: The length of the request body.

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: The client may specify the ETag for the entity on the request in order to compare to the ETag maintained by the service for the purpose of optimistic concurrency.
trans-unit.target: The client may specify the ETag for the entity on the request in order to compare to the ETag maintained by the service for the purpose of optimistic concurrency.

trans-unit.source: The update operation will be performed only if the ETag sent by the client matches the value maintained by the server, indicating that the entity has not been modified since it was retrieved by the client.
trans-unit.target: The update operation will be performed only if the ETag sent by the client matches the value maintained by the server, indicating that the entity has not been modified since it was retrieved by the client.

trans-unit.source: To force an unconditional update, set <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference> to the wildcard character (*).
trans-unit.target: To force an unconditional update, set <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference> to the wildcard character (*).

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.
trans-unit.target: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1727932c-8a3b-4502-86ac-c89931d54bac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Logging</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1727932c-8a3b-4502-86ac-c89931d54bac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Logging</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Merge Entity</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation sends the entity to be updated as an OData entity, which may be either a JSON or an Atom feed.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Merge Entity</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation sends the entity to be updated as an OData entity, which may be either a JSON or an Atom feed.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="8f029e46-f7c1-476a-b349-0649551aa127" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Inserting and Updating Entities</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="8f029e46-f7c1-476a-b349-0649551aa127" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Inserting and Updating Entities</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 204 (No Content).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 204 (No Content).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link> and <link xlink:href="a34b70ea-3b69-406e-9b1e-660358d997a3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table Storage Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link> and <link xlink:href="a34b70ea-3b69-406e-9b1e-660358d997a3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table Storage Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Response header
trans-unit.target: Response header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: The ETag for the entity.
trans-unit.target: The ETag for the entity.

trans-unit.source: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.
trans-unit.target: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the version of the Table service used to execute the request.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the version of the Table service used to execute the request.

trans-unit.source: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.
trans-unit.target: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.

trans-unit.source: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.
trans-unit.target: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Sample Response
trans-unit.target: Sample Response

trans-unit.source: Authorization
trans-unit.target: Authorization

trans-unit.source: This operation can be performed by the account owner and by anyone with a shared access signature that has permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: This operation can be performed by the account owner and by anyone with a shared access signature that has permission to perform this operation.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: Any properties with <languageKeyword>null</languageKeyword> values are ignored by the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Merge Entity</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation.
trans-unit.target: Any properties with <languageKeyword>null</languageKeyword> values are ignored by the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Merge Entity</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation.

trans-unit.source: All other properties will be updated.
trans-unit.target: All other properties will be updated.

trans-unit.source: A property cannot be removed with a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Merge Entity</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation.
trans-unit.target: A property cannot be removed with a <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Merge Entity</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation.

trans-unit.source: To remove a property from an entity, replace the entity by calling the <link xlink:href="96a833e2-388c-460c-bfad-11e723c67d3f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Entity</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: To remove a property from an entity, replace the entity by calling the <link xlink:href="96a833e2-388c-460c-bfad-11e723c67d3f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Entity</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: When merging an entity, you must specify the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>PartitionKey</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> and <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>RowKey</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> system properties as part of the merge operation.
trans-unit.target: When merging an entity, you must specify the <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>PartitionKey</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> and <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>RowKey</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> system properties as part of the merge operation.

trans-unit.source: An entity's ETag provides default optimistic concurrency for merge operations.
trans-unit.target: An entity's ETag provides default optimistic concurrency for merge operations.

trans-unit.source: The ETag value is opaque and should not be read or relied upon.
trans-unit.target: The ETag value is opaque and should not be read or relied upon.

trans-unit.source: Before a merge operation occurs, the Table service verifies that the entity's current ETag value is identical to the ETag value included with the request in the <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference> header.
trans-unit.target: Before a merge operation occurs, the Table service verifies that the entity's current ETag value is identical to the ETag value included with the request in the <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference> header.

trans-unit.source: If the values are identical, the Table service determines that the entity has not been modified since it was retrieved, and the merge operation proceeds.
trans-unit.target: If the values are identical, the Table service determines that the entity has not been modified since it was retrieved, and the merge operation proceeds.

trans-unit.source: If the entity's ETag differs from that specified with the merge request, the merge operation fails with status code 412 (Precondition Failed).
trans-unit.target: If the entity's ETag differs from that specified with the merge request, the merge operation fails with status code 412 (Precondition Failed).

trans-unit.source: This error indicates that the entity has been changed on the server since it was retrieved.
trans-unit.target: This error indicates that the entity has been changed on the server since it was retrieved.

trans-unit.source: To resolve this error, retrieve the entity again and reissue the request.
trans-unit.target: To resolve this error, retrieve the entity again and reissue the request.

trans-unit.source: To force an unconditional merge operation, set the value of the <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference> header to the wildcard character (*) on the request.
trans-unit.target: To force an unconditional merge operation, set the value of the <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference> header to the wildcard character (*) on the request.

trans-unit.source: Passing this value to the operation will override the default optimistic concurrency and ignore any mismatch in ETag values.
trans-unit.target: Passing this value to the operation will override the default optimistic concurrency and ignore any mismatch in ETag values.

trans-unit.source: If the <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference> header is missing from the request, the service returns status code 400 (Bad Request).
trans-unit.target: If the <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference> header is missing from the request, the service returns status code 400 (Bad Request).

trans-unit.source: A request malformed in other ways may also return 400; for more information, see <link xlink:href="a34b70ea-3b69-406e-9b1e-660358d997a3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table Storage Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: A request malformed in other ways may also return 400; for more information, see <link xlink:href="a34b70ea-3b69-406e-9b1e-660358d997a3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Table Storage Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Any application that can authenticate and send an HTTP MERGE request can merge an entity.
trans-unit.target: Any application that can authenticate and send an HTTP MERGE request can merge an entity.

trans-unit.source: For more information about constructing a query by using HTTP MERGE, see <externalLink><linkText>How to: Add, Modify, and Delete Entities</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd756368.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about constructing a query by using HTTP MERGE, see <externalLink><linkText>How to: Add, Modify, and Delete Entities</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd756368.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: For information about performing batch merge operations, see <link xlink:href="b10963c6-ced3-4fcc-abee-58a9e1c2b83a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Performing Entity Group Transactions</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about performing batch merge operations, see <link xlink:href="b10963c6-ced3-4fcc-abee-58a9e1c2b83a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Performing Entity Group Transactions</link>.
